## Preparation

Load libraries, scripts, and data:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
source("R/vaccination.R")
source("R/diversity.R")

vacc_data <- vacc_load_data()
div_data <- div_load_data("../temp/CHE/diversity_by_time.csv")
```


## Basic plots

### Diversity over time

```{r}
ggplot(div_data) +
        geom_point(aes(x = date, y = diversity_measure))
```
